name: The Late Shift
description:
Working Prototype for a horror game I am making. 

MAKE SURE TO PLAY IN FULL SCREEN

Controls

- WASD Movement

- E to interact with door and USB Pickup 

Goal

- Collect 6 USBs

known Bugs

-Flashlight is a little wonky

-Phone doesn't rotate well

-No feedback on USB Pickup

- USB isn't destroyed when loading in to the same room

-UI Is not lined up correctly in full screen
